data.title: Safe ride around town
data.text: This service is one hundred percent safe and reliable. If your needing a ride from one person to 20 people they are there to serve you. Awesome service.

data.title: 30th Birthday gift to myself! Worth it!
data.text: I've never rented a Limo and the owner was kind, helpful, wasn't pushy or anything! He was so down to earth and talkative! You could tell he really enjoyed his job! My birthday party guests enjoyed themselves! Awesome Job Presidential Limousine Peeps! :)

owner_response.author: prestravel, Owner at Presidential Limousines & Luxury Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank You So Much For The Review, Your Birthday was awesome and The kids had a awesome time... Hope to see you again soon when you are back in the Black Hills.. Always Here to Help ... God Bless .. Jeremy
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wow! What a great way to see the Black Hills!
data.text: We only had a short time to get out and see the Black Hills highlights, and Presidential Limousines was the perfect way to do it! They picked us up exactly on time and we rode with 2 other really cool couples to Mt Rushmore, Crazy Horse, and then had lunch at the Naked Winery! The limousine was beautiful and clean, and our driver was just awesome! We never felt rushed, and can say this was a fantastic experience! Can't recommend this tour more highly! Thanks, Presidential!
